answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some resources that may be a helpful start to your research.
This is a report from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Pennsylvania State University. It details the “Economics of Cloud Computing” and its advantages over in-house systems.
http://www.cse.psu.edu/research/publications/tech-reports/2011/cse-11-002.pdf
This article briefly discusses the cost of Cloud systems vs. Co-location.
http://www.datacenterknowledge.com/archives/2010/08/23/comparing-the-cost-of-cloud-vs-colocation/
Also, a found a blog with general information on cloud system costs.
http://www.uptimesoftware.com/uptimeblog/cloud-virtualization/cost-of-cloud-computing-expensive/
This article details governments in the UK that have made the move to a cloud system.
http://icma.org/en/Article/100375/Government_with_its_own_cloud_computing_system
Below is a similar article about the popularity of cloud computing in Washington DC.
http://icma.org/en/Article/100338/Washington_DC_and_Cloud_Computing
Also, a month from today ICMA will be hosting a Webinar on Cloud Computing for Local Government. See the link below for more information about the course and its costs.
http://icma.org/en/CalendarEvent/100353/Cloud_Computing_for_Local_Government
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

answers.author: Beverly Thames
answers.text:
Thanks Alexandra. The blog posts had links to more information. Eventually I ended up at these two sites:
 Cloud Price Calculator - a super simple way to compare cloud hosting costs among vendors
http://cloudpricecalculator.com/
AWS Economics Center - loads of resources, including spreadsheets to help you compare costs
http://aws.amazon.com/economics/
I also registered for the ICMA webinar next month.

author: Beverly Thames
text: My county is moving to a Drupal web content management system. We are trying to decide between hosting the new website in our county data center or moving to the cloud. Has anyone done a cost-benefit analysis for in-house vs cloud web hosting?
title: cost-benefit for in-house IT vs cloud
